definition[0]: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect
example[0]: measures to curb the spread of the virus
definition[1]: an influence which helps to control or limit something
example[1]: We are trying to keep a curb on their activities.
definition[2]: the raised edge of a road, between where people can walk and cars can drive
definition[3]: to control or limit something that has a harmful effect
example[2]: The new governmentâ€™s priority is to curb inflation.
definition[4]: a control or limit on something
example[3]: The plan called for curbs on government spending.
